properties.name: foobar.enableSecurity
properties.description: If disabled, everyone is allowed to do everything at every path.

properties.name: foobar.enableCsrfProtection
properties.description: If disabled, the default csrf protection no longer works.

properties.name: foobar.anonymousUid
properties.description: The uid to pretend when user is anonymous.

properties.name: foobar.anonymousNickname
properties.description: The nickname of the Person when user is anonymous.

properties.name: foobar.uidBegin
properties.description: The initial previous uid if none uid exists in database, which is the brand new one minus 1.
